item.title: Multivision
item.description:
I created a landing page for our team at Multivision.ai, focusing on clear navigation and engaging design to effectively showcase our projects and services.

Visit Multivision page

item.title: Paramount Plants
item.description:
I contributed to ParamountPlants.co.uk, focusing primarily on improving the website’s security rather than site development. My role involved identifying vulnerabilities, implementing security measures, and ensuring a safe browsing experience for users.

Visit ParamountPlants page

item.title: My hobby project
item.description:
These are my hobby projects. I like to play around with different technologies and see what I can build.

Visit my hobby project page

item.title: IBM Video
item.description:
At IBM, I worked on the IBM Video Streaming platform, focusing on building and improving its UI components. My main tasks included creating new, reusable components and designing responsive, user-friendly layouts to improve the customer experience.

Visit IBM Video page
